title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. To us, it's not about cakes and candles â€”it's about being an organization ready to take on the challenges of our second century. Take a look at what we're doing locally and get involved! Volunteer You can help Thomas Edison NHP in a variety of ways from enhancing visitor services to sharing your specialized expertise to help protect and preserve park resources. Planning View planning documents for recent projects in Thomas Edison NHP. Support Your Park Learn ways you cam become more involved to help preserve the rich historical and cultural resources protected here at Thomas Edison National Historical Park.
